overview: ""Silver Man" is about Iranian elites who want to raise the Iranian flag in the international taekwondo competition. The tournament is held in Turkey, but before it starts, a terrorist incident occurs and this is the beginning of the story..." is about Iranian elites who want to raise the Iranian flag in the international taekwondo competition. The tournament is held in Turkey, but before it starts, a terrorist incident occurs and this is the beginning of the story...
title: Silver Man
